description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Overall responsible for achieving sales target of the Channel Partner business
              
              -	Develop, support and monitor existing as well as find new channel partners
              
              -	Train, support dealer about the product and application
              
              -	Plan and execute (promotion) campaigns (e-mailers, direct mailers, seminars, exhibitions)
              
              -	Collect market information and give inputs for positioning
              
              -	Create regular reports and market analysis to manager
              
              -	Help troubleshoot product and other issues by collaborating with international support
              
              -	Keep material up to date (electronic and printed documents, demo equipment)
              
              -	Visit key accounts and other customers (with channel partner)
              

              Desired Outcomes / KPIs
              
              -	Achieve sales target
              
              -	Fulfil KPIs setting
              

              Report to: Sales Manager
              
              Workplace: G Floor, SCS Building, Plot T2-4, D1 Street, Saigon Hi-tech Park, Tan Phu Ward, Dist. 9, HCM City, Vietnam
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Education: Bachelor in Chemistry, Food Science, Biochemistry Environmental Science or similar
              
              -	English: be able to read and speak
              
              -	Computer skills: Ms. Office
              
              -	Experience: 2 years in technical sales are in advantage and at least 1-year work experiences in a laboratory or quality control
              
              -	Competencies:
              
              •	One Team: Work together with fellow employees worldwide towards common goals
              
              •	Perform with Integrity: behave ethically and legally
              
              •	Pursue Innovation: put good ideas to work
              
              •	Deliver Quality: give our best, present and communicate professionally
              
              •	Drive Continuous Improvement: seize opportunities to make a difference
              

              Key Relationships
              
              -	Internal: Sales team, Marketing team, Service team, F&A team, Regional and Global colleagues
              
              -	External: Customers
              

              We Provide
              
              -	International and stable work environment
              
              -	Training on products and selling skills in Vietnam and abroad
              
              -	Dynamic team and open atmosphere
              
              -	Mid- and long-term development possibilities
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Commission & Bonus
               







                Training on products in Vietnam and abroad, professional sales coaching
               







                Dynamic team and open atmosphere
